front.title: A Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) INFO Package for Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) Events

abstract.t: The SIP INFO request method now supports explicit indication and exchange of specified application information. Such usages are documented as an "INFO Package", following the requirements outlined in [info-packages]. This document specifies one such SIP INFO Package, for the purpose of indicating DTMF signals.
